mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_BOARD (id, category, title, content, writer) VALUES(notice_board_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id board_num, category, title, content, hit, REGDATE, writer, name FROM NOTICE_BOARD b, (select id, name from MEMBER) m WHERE b.writer = m.id AND b.id = #{id}
